snippet: The Los Angeles Angels took their playoff hopes into the final day of the regular season with an 11-10 win that kept the Rangers from clinching the American League West title.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Los Angeles Angels defeat Texas Rangers, 11-10, keeping Rangers from clinching American League West title; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Angels took their playoff hopes into the final day of the regular season with an 11-10 win that kept the Rangers from clinching the American League West title.

headline.print_headline: Three Outs From a Title, the Rangers Tumble
headline.main: Three Outs From a Title, the Rangers Tumble
